client/src/pages/about-us.tsx.content:
import Navigation from '@/components/navigation'; import Footer from '@/components/footer'; import ParticleBackground from '@/components/particle-background'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { BRAND_LOGOS, CONTACT_INFO, SOCIAL_LINKS } from '@/lib/constants'; export default function AboutUs() { return (

About B4U Esports

Pioneering the Future of Gaming Commerce

Our Mission

B4U Esports is dedicated to revolutionizing the gaming marketplace by seamlessly integrating cryptocurrency payments through Pi Network. We believe that gaming should be accessible, secure, and innovative, bridging the gap between traditional gaming commerce and the future of digital currency.

Our mission is to empower gamers worldwide with a safe, reliable, and cutting-edge platform where they can purchase in-game currencies using Pi coins, creating a new standard for digital gaming transactions.

Our Vision

To become the world's leading Pi Network-integrated gaming marketplace, setting the standard for cryptocurrency adoption in the gaming industry. We envision a future where digital currency transactions are as natural as traditional payments, making gaming more inclusive and accessible globally.

We strive to be the bridge that connects the gaming community with the revolutionary potential of Pi Network, creating opportunities for millions of gamers to participate in the digital economy.

Our Values

Security First

We prioritize the security of our users' data and transactions, implementing industry-leading security measures and Pi Network's cryptographic protection.

Innovation

We embrace cutting-edge technology and continuously evolve our platform to provide the best possible user experience.

Transparency

We believe in open communication with our users, providing clear information about pricing, policies, and processes.

Community Focus

Our users are at the heart of everything we do. We listen to feedback and continuously improve based on community needs.

 Pi Network Partnership

Our partnership with Pi Network represents a significant milestone in bringing cryptocurrency to the gaming world. By integrating Pi Network's revolutionary payment system, we offer users a secure, fast, and innovative way to purchase gaming currencies.

This collaboration allows us to leverage Pi Network's growing ecosystem while providing their community with practical utility for their Pi coins in the gaming space.

Gaming Excellence

We specialize in providing premium gaming currency services for popular mobile games:

PUBG Mobile

Providing UC (Unknown Cash) packages for one of the world's most popular battle royale games, enabling players to enhance their gaming experience.

Mobile Legends: Bang Bang

Offering Diamond packages for the leading MOBA game, helping players unlock heroes, skins, and premium content.

 Why Choose B4U Esports?

Real-Time Pricing

Live Pi/USD conversion rates updated every 60 seconds for accurate pricing.

Secure Transactions

Protected by Pi Network's advanced cryptographic security and our robust infrastructure.

24/7 Support

Round-the-clock customer support to assist with any questions or issues.

 Get in Touch

We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or need support, our team is here to help.

Contact Information

{CONTACT_INFO.EMAIL}

{CONTACT_INFO.PHONE}

Follow Us

 Our Commitment

At B4U Esports, we are committed to providing a safe, reliable, and innovative platform for all gamers. We continuously invest in technology, security, and user experience to ensure that our platform meets the highest standards of quality and reliability.

As we grow and evolve, we remain dedicated to our core mission of making gaming more accessible and enjoyable through the power of cryptocurrency and innovative technology.

Thank you for choosing B4U Esports!

Together, we're building the future of gaming commerce.

); }

client/src/pages/data-protection.tsx.content:
import Navigation from '@/components/navigation'; import Footer from '@/components/footer'; import ParticleBackground from '@/components/particle-background'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; export default function DataProtection() { return (

Data Protection Policy

Last updated: January 2025

1. Our Commitment to Data Protection

B4U Esports is committed to protecting your personal data and respecting your privacy rights. This Data Protection Policy outlines how we collect, process, store, and protect your information in compliance with applicable data protection laws and regulations.

We implement robust technical and organizational measures to ensure the security and confidentiality of your personal data throughout our systems and processes.

 2. Legal Basis for Processing

We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

  • Consent: You have given clear consent for us to process your data for specific purposes
  • Contract Performance: Processing is necessary to fulfill our service obligations to you
  • Legal Obligations: We must process your data to comply with legal requirements
  • Legitimate Interests: Processing serves our legitimate business interests while respecting your rights
  • Vital Interests: Processing protects your essential interests or those of others
 3. Data Collection and Processing

We collect and process the following types of personal data:

Identity Data:

  • Pi Network username and UID
  • Email address and phone number
  • Country and language preferences

Gaming Data:

  • PUBG Mobile IGN and UID
  • Mobile Legends User ID and Zone ID
  • Gaming preferences and history

Transaction Data:

  • Payment history and amounts
  • Pi Network transaction details
  • Purchase patterns and preferences

Technical Data:

  • IP address and device information
  • Browser type and settings
  • Usage analytics and performance data
 4. Data Security Measures

We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your data:

Technical Safeguards:

  • End-to-end encryption for data transmission
  • Secure database storage with encryption at rest
  • Multi-factor authentication for admin access
  • Regular security audits and penetration testing
  • Automated backup and disaster recovery systems

Organizational Safeguards:

  • Limited access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
  • Regular staff training on data protection
  • Confidentiality agreements for all personnel
  • Incident response procedures
  • Data protection impact assessments
 5. Data Retention and Deletion

We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary:

  • Active Accounts: Data retained while your account is active and in use
  • Transaction Records: Kept for 7 years for legal and tax compliance
  • Marketing Data: Retained until you withdraw consent or object
  • Support Records: Kept for 3 years after last contact
  • Legal Hold: Extended retention if required for legal proceedings

When retention periods expire, we securely delete or anonymize your data using industry-standard methods.

 6. Your Data Protection Rights

You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

  • Right of Access: Request information about your personal data we process
  • Right of Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
  • Right of Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data ("right to be forgotten")
  • Right to Restrict Processing: Limit how we use your data
  • Right to Data Portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
  • Right to Object: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
  • Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent for consent-based processing

To exercise these rights, contact us at info@b4uesports.com

 7. International Data Transfers

When we transfer your data internationally, we ensure adequate protection through:

  • Adequacy Decisions: Transfers to countries with adequate data protection laws
  • Standard Contractual Clauses: EU-approved clauses for international transfers
  • Binding Corporate Rules: Internal rules ensuring consistent protection
  • Certification Schemes: Industry-recognized data protection certifications
  • Codes of Conduct: Adherence to approved industry standards
 8. Third-Party Data Sharing

We share your data with third parties only when necessary and with appropriate safeguards:

Service Providers:

  • Cloud hosting and storage providers
  • Email and communication services
  • Analytics and monitoring tools
  • Customer support platforms

Game Publishers:

  • PUBG Mobile (Tencent/Krafton) for UC delivery
  • Mobile Legends (Moonton) for Diamond delivery

Payment Processors:

  • Pi Network for authentication and payments

All third parties are contractually obligated to protect your data and use it only for specified purposes.

 9. Data Breach Response

In the event of a data breach, we have established procedures to:

  • Detection: Automated monitoring systems detect potential breaches
  • Assessment: Rapid evaluation of breach scope and impact
  • Containment: Immediate steps to stop the breach and secure systems
  • Notification: Authorities notified within 72 hours if required
  • Communication: Affected users informed without undue delay
  • Remediation: Steps taken to prevent future occurrences
  • Documentation: Full incident report and lessons learned
 10. Privacy by Design

We implement privacy by design principles throughout our operations:

  • Data Minimization: Collect only data necessary for our services
  • Purpose Limitation: Use data only for stated purposes
  • Storage Limitation: Retain data only as long as necessary
  • Accuracy: Ensure data is accurate and up-to-date
  • Security: Implement appropriate technical and organizational measures
  • Accountability: Demonstrate compliance with data protection principles
  • Transparency: Provide clear information about data processing
 11. Children's Data Protection

We take special care to protect children's personal data:

  • We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13
  • Enhanced verification procedures for users under 18
  • Parental consent mechanisms where required
  • Additional security measures for young users
  • Regular reviews of age verification processes
  • Immediate deletion if we discover underage data collection
 12. Contact and Complaints

For data protection inquiries or complaints:

Data Protection Officer

B4U Esports

Email: info@b4uesports.com

Phone: +975 17875099

Response Time: Within 30 days

You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority if you believe we have not addressed your concerns adequately.
); }

import Navigation from '@/components/navigation'; import Footer from '@/components/footer'; import ParticleBackground from '@/components/particle-background'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'; import { BRAND_LOGOS } from '@/lib/constants'; export default function OurHistory() { const milestones = [ { year: "2023", title: "Foundation & Vision", description: "B4U Esports was founded with a vision to revolutionize gaming commerce through cryptocurrency integration.", icon: "fa-rocket", color: "bg-gaming-blue" }, { year: "2024", title: "Pi Network Partnership", description: "Strategic partnership with Pi Network established, becoming one of the first gaming platforms to integrate Pi cryptocurrency.", icon: "fa-handshake", color: "bg-gaming-purple" }, { year: "2024", title: "PUBG Mobile Integration", description: "Successfully launched PUBG Mobile UC purchasing system with real-time Pi currency conversion.", icon: "fa-gamepad", color: "bg-gaming-green" }, { year: "2024", title: "Mobile Legends Support", description: "Expanded services to include Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Diamond purchases, doubling our game portfolio.", icon: "fa-gem", color: "bg-gaming-gold" }, { year: "2025", title: "Platform Maturity", description: "Achieved full platform stability with 24/7 support, real-time pricing, and enhanced security features.", icon: "fa-crown", color: "bg-gaming-red" } ]; const achievements = [ { number: "1000+", label: "Happy Users", icon: "fa-users", color: "text-gaming-blue" }, { number: "5000+", label: "Transactions", icon: "fa-exchange-alt", color: "text-gaming-green" }, { number: "99.9%", label: "Uptime", icon: "fa-server", color: "text-gaming-purple" }, { number: "24/7", label: "Support", icon: "fa-headset", color: "text-gaming-gold" } ]; return (

Our History

The Journey of Innovation and Growth

Our Story

B4U Esports began as a vision to bridge the gap between traditional gaming commerce and the emerging world of cryptocurrency. Founded by passionate gamers and technology enthusiasts, our company was born from the belief that gaming should be at the forefront of financial innovation.

From our humble beginnings to becoming a pioneer in Pi Network-integrated gaming services, our journey has been marked by continuous innovation, user-focused development, and an unwavering commitment to security and reliability.

Key Milestones
{milestones.map((milestone, index) => (
{milestone.year}

{milestone.title}

{milestone.description}

))}
Achievements by Numbers
{achievements.map((achievement, index) => (
{achievement.number}
{achievement.label}
))}
Innovation Highlights

First-to-Market Pi Integration

We were among the first gaming platforms to successfully integrate Pi Network's payment system, pioneering the use of Pi cryptocurrency for gaming transactions.

Real-Time Price Engine

Developed a sophisticated real-time pricing system that updates Pi/USD conversion rates every 60 seconds, ensuring accurate and fair pricing for all transactions.

Advanced Security Framework

Implemented multi-layered security measures including blockchain verification, encrypted data storage, and secure payment processing to protect user transactions.

Automated Delivery System

Created an automated delivery system that processes gaming currency purchases within 5-10 minutes, providing instant gratification for users.

Community Growth

Our growth has been driven by the trust and support of our gaming community. From our first transaction to thousands of successful purchases, each milestone has been achieved through:

  • User Feedback: Continuously improving based on community suggestions
  • Transparency: Maintaining open communication about platform updates and changes
  • Reliability: Ensuring consistent service quality and uptime
  • Innovation: Staying ahead of technology trends and user needs
  • Support: Providing responsive customer service and technical assistance
 Strategic Partnerships

Pi Network

Our foundational partnership with Pi Network enables secure, innovative cryptocurrency transactions for gaming purchases.

PUBG Mobile Ecosystem

Authorized integration with PUBG Mobile's UC system, ensuring legitimate and secure currency delivery.

Mobile Legends: Bang Bang

Official partnership for Diamond delivery services, expanding our reach in the MOBA gaming community.

Looking Forward

As we continue to grow, our focus remains on innovation, security, and user satisfaction. Our roadmap includes:

New Game Support

Expanding to support more popular mobile games and their in-game currencies.

Enhanced Features

Advanced user dashboard, loyalty programs, and personalized gaming experiences.

Global Expansion

Extending our services to more countries and supporting additional payment methods.

Next-Gen Technology

Implementing AI-powered recommendations and blockchain-based transaction verification.

 Thank You

Thank You for Being Part of Our Journey

Every transaction, every piece of feedback, and every moment of trust you've placed in us has helped shape B4U Esports into what it is today.

Together, we're not just changing how gamers purchase in-game currencies â€“ we're pioneering the future of gaming commerce.

); }

client/src/pages/privacy-policy.tsx.content:
import Navigation from '@/components/navigation'; import Footer from '@/components/footer'; import ParticleBackground from '@/components/particle-background'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; export default function PrivacyPolicy() { return (

Privacy Policy

Last updated: January 2025

1. Information We Collect

When you use B4U Esports services, we collect:

  • Pi Network Information: Your Pi Network username, UID, and wallet address through Pi Network authentication
  • Personal Information: Email address, phone number, country, and language preferences
  • Gaming Information: Game account details including PUBG Mobile IGN/UID and Mobile Legends User ID/Zone ID
  • Transaction Data: Payment history, transaction amounts, and payment status
  • Technical Information: IP address, browser type, device information, and usage data
 2. How We Use Your Information

We use your information to:

  • Process and fulfill your gaming currency purchases
  • Authenticate your identity through Pi Network
  • Send purchase confirmations and transaction updates
  • Provide customer support and respond to inquiries
  • Improve our services and user experience
  • Comply with legal obligations and prevent fraud
  • Send important service announcements and updates
 3. Information Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

  • Pi Network: Authentication and payment processing through Pi Network's secure infrastructure
  • Game Publishers: Necessary game account information to deliver purchased gaming currency
  • Service Providers: Trusted third-party services that help us operate our platform (email services, analytics)
  • Legal Requirements: When required by law, regulation, or legal process
  • Safety and Security: To protect our users, platform, and legal rights
 4. Data Security

We implement robust security measures to protect your information:

  • SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission
  • Secure storage of personal and financial information
  • Regular security audits and updates
  • Access controls and authentication requirements
  • Pi Network's cryptographic security for payment processing
  • Hashed storage of sensitive authentication data
 5. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access: Request access to your personal information
  • Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information
  • Deletion: Request deletion of your account and personal data
  • Portability: Request a copy of your data in a portable format
  • Restriction: Limit how we process your information
  • Withdrawal: Withdraw consent for data processing where applicable

To exercise these rights, contact us at info@b4uesports.com

 6. Cookies and Tracking

We use cookies and similar technologies to:

  • Maintain your login session
  • Remember your preferences and settings
  • Analyze website usage and performance
  • Provide personalized content and features

You can control cookie settings through your browser, though some features may not function properly if cookies are disabled.

 7. International Transfers

Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during international transfers, including:

  • Compliance with applicable data protection laws
  • Contractual protections with service providers
  • Security measures equivalent to those in your home country
 8. Children's Privacy

Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it promptly.

 9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of material changes by:

  • Posting the updated policy on our website
  • Sending email notifications to registered users
  • Displaying prominent notices on our platform

Your continued use of our services after changes constitute acceptance of the updated policy.

 10. Contact Information

If you have questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

B4U Esports

Email: info@b4uesports.com

Phone: +975 17875099

We will respond to your inquiries within 30 days.
); }

client/src/pages/refund-policy.tsx.content:
import Navigation from '@/components/navigation'; import Footer from '@/components/footer'; import ParticleBackground from '@/components/particle-background'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; export default function RefundPolicy() { return (

Refund Policy

Last updated: January 2025

Important Notice

All sales of digital in-game currency are final and non-refundable. Please read this policy carefully before making any purchases.

1. No Refund Policy

B4U Esports operates a strict no-refund policy for all digital gaming currency purchases. This includes:

  • PUBG Mobile UC (Unknown Cash)
  • Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Diamonds
  • All other in-game currencies offered on our platform

Once a transaction is completed and gaming currency is delivered to your account, the sale is final.

 2. Reasons for No-Refund Policy

Our no-refund policy exists for several important reasons:

  • Digital Nature: Gaming currencies are digital goods that cannot be "returned" once delivered
  • Instant Delivery: Currency is delivered immediately to your game account
  • Fraud Prevention: Protects against fraudulent refund claims and chargebacks
  • Publisher Requirements: Game publishers do not allow reversal of currency transactions
  • Pi Network Integration: Cryptocurrency transactions are designed to be irreversible
  • Operational Costs: Processing refunds would require significant additional resources
 3. Pre-Purchase Verification

To avoid issues, please verify the following before completing your purchase:

  • Game Account Information: Ensure your PUBG UID or Mobile Legends User ID/Zone ID are correct
  • Package Selection: Verify you are purchasing the correct game and currency amount
  • Payment Amount: Confirm the Pi amount and USD equivalent before proceeding
  • Account Access: Ensure you have access to the game account where currency will be delivered
  • Game Version: Verify you are playing the correct version of the game (Global, regional, etc.)
 4. Exceptional Circumstances

While our general policy is no refunds, we may consider exceptions in very limited circumstances:

  • Technical Failure: If our system fails to deliver currency due to a technical error on our end
  • Wrong Currency Type: If we deliver the wrong type of currency due to a system error
  • Duplicate Charges: If you are accidentally charged multiple times for the same purchase
  • Service Outage: If our service is down but we still process your payment

Note: Exceptions require investigation and may take 5-10 business days to resolve.

 5. What is NOT Eligible for Refund

The following situations are NOT eligible for refunds:

  • Change of mind after purchase
  • Incorrect game account information provided by user
  • Loss of game account access after currency delivery
  • Game account suspension or ban by game publishers
  • Fluctuations in Pi cryptocurrency value
  • User dissatisfaction with the purchased game
  • Technical issues with the game itself (not our service)
  • Forgetting about automatic purchases or subscriptions
 6. Delivery Guarantee

While we maintain a no-refund policy, we guarantee delivery of your purchased gaming currency:

  • Delivery Time: Currency is typically delivered within 5-10 minutes
  • Delivery Confirmation: You will receive email confirmation when currency is delivered
  • Support Assistance: If delivery is delayed, contact our support team immediately
  • Tracking: All transactions are tracked and can be verified
 7. Dispute Resolution Process

If you believe you qualify for an exception to our no-refund policy:

  1. Contact Support: Email us at info@b4uesports.com within 24 hours of purchase
  2. Provide Information: Include your transaction ID, Pi payment ID, and detailed explanation
  3. Investigation: Our team will investigate your claim within 48 hours
  4. Documentation: Provide any requested screenshots or additional information
  5. Decision: We will provide a final decision within 5 business days
  6. Resolution: If approved, resolution will be completed within 7 business days
 8. Chargeback Policy

Due to the nature of cryptocurrency transactions through Pi Network:

  • Traditional credit card chargebacks are not applicable
  • Pi Network transactions are irreversible by design
  • Disputes must be resolved through our support system
  • We do not process payment reversals through Pi Network
 9. Customer Support

For assistance with purchases or delivery issues:

B4U Esports Support

Email: info@b4uesports.com

Phone: +975 17875099

Response Time: Within 24 hours

Available: 24/7 for urgent delivery issues

 10. Policy Updates

We may update this Refund Policy to reflect changes in our services or legal requirements. Updates will be:

  • Posted on our website with updated date
  • Communicated to users via email
  • Effective immediately upon posting
  • Applied to future transactions only

Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of any policy changes.

 11. Legal Framework

This Refund Policy is governed by:

  • Laws of Bhutan regarding digital commerce
  • International best practices for digital goods
  • Pi Network's terms and conditions
  • Game publishers' policies and requirements

This policy is designed to be fair while protecting the integrity of digital currency transactions.
); }

client/src/pages/terms-of-service.tsx.content:
import Navigation from '@/components/navigation'; import Footer from '@/components/footer'; import ParticleBackground from '@/components/particle-background'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; export default function TermsOfService() { return (

Terms of Service

Last updated: January 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using B4U Esports services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our services. Your continued use of our platform constitutes acceptance of any updates or modifications to these terms.

 2. Service Description

B4U Esports provides a digital marketplace for purchasing in-game currencies using Pi Network's cryptocurrency. Our services include:

  • Purchase of PUBG Mobile UC (Unknown Cash)
  • Purchase of Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Diamonds
  • Pi Network payment integration
  • Real-time pricing and currency conversion
  • Transaction history and account management
  • Customer support services
 3. Account Registration

To use our services, you must:

  • Have a valid Pi Network account
  • Be at least 13 years old (or the minimum age in your jurisdiction)
  • Provide accurate and complete information
  • Maintain the security of your account credentials
  • Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
  • Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
 4. Pi Network Integration

Our platform integrates with Pi Network for authentication and payments:

  • Testnet Mode: During development, transactions use Pi Testnet tokens with no real value
  • Mainnet Mode: Production transactions use real Pi cryptocurrency
  • Authentication: We verify your identity through Pi Network's secure systems
  • Payment Processing: All transactions are processed through Pi Network's infrastructure
  • Security: We implement Pi Network's recommended security practices
 5. Purchasing Terms

When making purchases through our platform:

  • Pricing: All prices are displayed in Pi cryptocurrency with USD equivalents
  • Payment: Payments are processed immediately upon confirmation
  • Delivery: Gaming currency is delivered to your specified game account within 5-10 minutes
  • Verification: You must provide accurate game account information
  • Confirmation: You will receive email confirmation of all purchases
  • Support: Contact us immediately if delivery fails or is delayed
 6. User Responsibilities

As a user of our services, you agree to:

  • Provide accurate game account information
  • Use the service only for legitimate gaming purposes
  • Not attempt to circumvent our security measures
  • Not use the service for any illegal activities
  • Respect intellectual property rights
  • Not interfere with other users' access to the service
  • Comply with applicable laws and regulations
 7. Prohibited Activities

The following activities are strictly prohibited:

  • Fraudulent transactions or payment reversals
  • Using stolen or unauthorized payment methods
  • Creating multiple accounts to abuse promotions
  • Attempting to hack or compromise our systems
  • Reselling purchased gaming currency
  • Using automated tools or bots
  • Violating game publishers' terms of service
 8. Intellectual Property

All content on our platform is protected by intellectual property laws:

  • B4U Esports: Our brand, logo, and platform design are our property
  • Game Content: PUBG Mobile and Mobile Legends content belongs to their respective publishers
  • Pi Network: Pi Network logos and branding are used with permission
  • User Content: You retain rights to your personal information and account data
 9. Disclaimers and Limitations

Our services are provided "as is" without warranties:

  • Service Availability: We do not guarantee uninterrupted service
  • Game Integration: We are not responsible for changes to game publishers' systems
  • Pi Network: We are not responsible for Pi Network technical issues
  • Market Fluctuations: Pi currency values may fluctuate
  • Third-Party Services: We are not liable for third-party service failures
 10. Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, B4U Esports shall not be liable for:

  • Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
  • Loss of profits, data, or business opportunities
  • Damages exceeding the amount paid for services
  • Issues arising from user error or negligence
  • Third-party actions or service interruptions
 11. Termination

We may terminate or suspend your account for:

  • Violation of these Terms of Service
  • Fraudulent or suspicious activity
  • Repeated customer service issues
  • Legal requirements or safety concerns

Upon termination, your access to services will cease, but completed transactions remain valid.

 12. Governing Law

These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of Bhutan. Any disputes will be resolved through:

  • Good faith negotiation
  • Mediation if necessary
  • Arbitration in Thimphu, Bhutan
  • Courts of competent jurisdiction in Bhutan
 13. Contact Information

For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us:

B4U Esports

Email: info@b4uesports.com

Phone: +975 17875099

We will respond to all inquiries within 48 hours.
); }

client/src/pages/user-agreement.tsx.content:
import Navigation from '@/components/navigation'; import Footer from '@/components/footer'; import ParticleBackground from '@/components/particle-background'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; export default function UserAgreement() { return (

User Agreement

Last updated: January 2025

1. Agreement Overview

This User Agreement ("Agreement") is a legally binding contract between you ("User") and B4U Esports ("Company," "we," "us," or "our"). By creating an account or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all terms and conditions contained in this Agreement.

This Agreement governs your access to and use of our Pi Network-integrated gaming marketplace platform, including all features, content, and services offered through our website and applications.

 2. User Eligibility and Account Creation

To use our services, you must:

  • Age Requirements: Be at least 13 years old, or the minimum age in your jurisdiction
  • Pi Network Account: Have a valid, active Pi Network account in good standing
  • Legal Capacity: Have the legal capacity to enter into binding agreements
  • Accurate Information: Provide truthful, accurate, and complete information
  • Compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
  • Single Account: Maintain only one account per person

We reserve the right to verify your identity and eligibility at any time.

 3. User Obligations and Responsibilities

As a user of our platform, you agree to:

Account Security:

  • Maintain the confidentiality of your login credentials
  • Use strong, unique passwords for your accounts
  • Enable two-factor authentication when available
  • Immediately notify us of any unauthorized access
  • Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

Lawful Use:

  • Use our services only for legitimate gaming purposes
  • Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
  • Respect the intellectual property rights of others
  • Not engage in any fraudulent or deceptive practices
  • Not use our services for money laundering or illegal activities
 4. Game Account Verification and Accuracy

You are solely responsible for providing accurate game account information:

  • PUBG Mobile: Correct IGN (In-Game Name) and UID (User ID)
  • Mobile Legends: Accurate User ID and Zone ID
  • Verification: Double-check all information before confirming purchases
  • Updates: Keep your game account information current in your profile
  • Consequences: Incorrect information may result in failed delivery or loss of purchase
  • No Refunds: We are not responsible for delivery failures due to incorrect user-provided information
 5. Payment Terms and Pi Network Integration

Our payment system is integrated with Pi Network:

Payment Processing:

  • All payments are processed through Pi Network's secure infrastructure
  • Transactions are recorded on the Pi blockchain
  • Payment confirmation is required before service delivery
  • Real-time pricing reflects current Pi/USD exchange rates

User Responsibilities:

  • Ensure sufficient Pi balance before making purchases
  • Verify transaction details before confirming payment
  • Understand that blockchain transactions are irreversible
  • Accept current market pricing at the time of purchase
 6. Service Availability and Performance

We strive to provide reliable service, but you acknowledge:

  • Availability: Services may be temporarily unavailable due to maintenance or technical issues
  • Performance: Service speed and reliability may vary based on network conditions
  • Third-Party Dependencies: Our services depend on Pi Network and game publisher systems
  • Updates: We may update or modify our services without prior notice
  • Compatibility: Services may not be compatible with all devices or browsers
  • Geographic Limitations: Some features may not be available in all locations
 7. Prohibited Activities and Conduct

The following activities are strictly prohibited:

Fraudulent Activities:

  • Using stolen or unauthorized payment methods
  • Creating false identities or impersonating others
  • Attempting to reverse or chargeback completed transactions
  • Manipulating pricing or payment systems

Technical Violations:

  • Attempting to hack, crack, or compromise our systems
  • Using automated tools, bots, or scripts
  • Reverse engineering our software or services
  • Interfering with other users' access to services

Commercial Violations:

  • Reselling gaming currency purchased through our platform
  • Using our services for commercial purposes without authorization
  • Creating multiple accounts to abuse promotions or limits
 8. Intellectual Property Rights

You acknowledge and agree that:

  • Our Content: All B4U Esports content, including design, text, graphics, and software, is our property
  • Game Content: PUBG Mobile and Mobile Legends content belongs to their respective publishers
  • Pi Network: Pi Network logos and content are used under license
  • Limited License: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive license to use our services
  • Restrictions: You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works
  • Feedback: Any feedback you provide may be used by us without compensation
 9. Privacy and Data Usage

Your privacy is important to us. By using our services, you consent to:

  • Collection and processing of personal data as outlined in our Privacy Policy
  • Sharing necessary information with game publishers for service delivery
  • Use of cookies and tracking technologies to improve our services
  • Communication from us regarding your account and transactions
  • Data transfer to third-party service providers for operational purposes
  • Retention of transaction records for legal and compliance purposes

Please review our Privacy Policy and Data Protection Policy for detailed information.

 10. Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability

You understand and agree that:

Service Disclaimers:

  • Services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind
  • We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service
  • We are not responsible for third-party service failures
  • Game publisher policies and systems are beyond our control

Limitation of Liability:

  • Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the specific transaction
  • We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
  • You release us from claims arising from your use of our services
  • These limitations apply to the fullest extent permitted by law
 11. Account Termination and Suspension

We may terminate or suspend your account for:

  • Violation of this Agreement or our policies
  • Fraudulent or suspicious activity
  • Violation of applicable laws or regulations
  • Abuse of our customer support systems
  • Multiple disputes or chargebacks
  • Extended inactivity (with prior notice)

Upon termination, your access to services will cease, but completed transactions remain valid. You may also terminate your account at any time by contacting our support team.

 12. Dispute Resolution and Governing Law

This Agreement is governed by the laws of Bhutan. For dispute resolution:

Resolution Process:

  1. Direct Communication: Contact our support team first
  2. Good Faith Negotiation: Attempt to resolve disputes amicably
  3. Mediation: Use neutral mediation if direct negotiation fails
  4. Arbitration: Binding arbitration in Thimphu, Bhutan
  5. Legal Action: Court proceedings only after exhausting other options

Limitations:

  • Claims must be filed within one year of the dispute arising
  • Class action lawsuits are not permitted
  • Disputes must be resolved individually
 13. Agreement Modifications

We may modify this Agreement to reflect:

  • Changes in our services or business practices
  • Legal or regulatory requirements
  • Industry standards and best practices
  • User feedback and platform improvements

We will notify you of material changes through:

  • Email notifications to your registered address
  • Prominent notices on our platform
  • Updated agreement with revision date

Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Agreement.

 14. Contact Information and Support

For questions about this Agreement or our services:

B4U Esports Customer Support

Email: info@b4uesports.com

Phone: +975 17875099

Response Time: Within 24 hours

Emergency Support: Available 24/7 for transaction issues

By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this User Agreement in its entirety.
); }

client/src/components/ui/checkbox.tsx.content:
import * as React from "react"
import * as CheckboxPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-checkbox"
import { Check } from "lucide-react"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const Checkbox = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof CheckboxPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof CheckboxPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
  <CheckboxPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn(
      "peer h-4 w-4 shrink-0 rounded-sm border border-primary ring-offset-background focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 data-[state=checked]:bg-primary data-[state=checked]:text-primary-foreground",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <CheckboxPrimitive.Indicator
      className={cn("flex items-center justify-center text-current")}
    >
      <Check className="h-4 w-4" />
    </CheckboxPrimitive.Indicator>
  </CheckboxPrimitive.Root>
))
Checkbox.displayName = CheckboxPrimitive.Root.displayName

export { Checkbox }

)) NavigationMenuViewport.displayName = NavigationMenuPrimitive.Viewport.displayName const NavigationMenuIndicator = React.forwardRef< React.ElementRef, React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef >(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
)) NavigationMenuIndicator.displayName = NavigationMenuPrimitive.Indicator.displayName export { navigationMenuTriggerStyle, NavigationMenu, NavigationMenuList, NavigationMenuItem, NavigationMenuContent, NavigationMenuTrigger, NavigationMenuLink, NavigationMenuIndicator, NavigationMenuViewport, }

client/src/components/ui/progress.tsx.content:
"use client"

import * as React from "react"
import * as ProgressPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-progress"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const Progress = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ProgressPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ProgressPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, value, ...props }, ref) => (
  <ProgressPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn(
      "relative h-4 w-full overflow-hidden rounded-full bg-secondary",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <ProgressPrimitive.Indicator
      className="h-full w-full flex-1 bg-primary transition-all"
      style={{ transform: `translateX(-${100 - (value || 0)}%)` }}
    />
  </ProgressPrimitive.Root>
))
Progress.displayName = ProgressPrimitive.Root.displayName

export { Progress }

client/src/components/ui/scroll-area.tsx.content:
import * as React from "react"
import * as ScrollAreaPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-scroll-area"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const ScrollArea = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, children, ...props }, ref) => (
  <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn("relative overflow-hidden", className)}
    {...props}
  >
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Viewport className="h-full w-full rounded-[inherit]">
      {children}
    </ScrollAreaPrimitive.Viewport>
    <ScrollBar />
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Corner />
  </ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>
))
ScrollArea.displayName = ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root.displayName

const ScrollBar = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>
>(({ className, orientation = "vertical", ...props }, ref) => (
  <ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar
    ref={ref}
    orientation={orientation}
    className={cn(
      "flex touch-none select-none transition-colors",
      orientation === "vertical" &&
        "h-full w-2.5 border-l border-l-transparent p-[1px]",
      orientation === "horizontal" &&
        "h-2.5 flex-col border-t border-t-transparent p-[1px]",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaThumb className="relative flex-1 rounded-full bg-border" />
  </ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>
))
ScrollBar.displayName = ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar.displayName

export { ScrollArea, ScrollBar }

client/src/components/ui/slider.tsx.content:
import * as React from "react"
import * as SliderPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-slider"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const Slider = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof SliderPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof SliderPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
  <SliderPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn(
      "relative flex w-full touch-none select-none items-center",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <SliderPrimitive.Track className="relative h-2 w-full grow overflow-hidden rounded-full bg-secondary">
      <SliderPrimitive.Range className="absolute h-full bg-primary" />
    </SliderPrimitive.Track>
    <SliderPrimitive.Thumb className="block h-5 w-5 rounded-full border-2 border-primary bg-background ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50" />
  </SliderPrimitive.Root>
))
Slider.displayName = SliderPrimitive.Root.displayName

export { Slider }
